page.title: 113 GAMES WE PLAY IN AMBERLEY
page.content: When ther are only two of us skipping we tie the end of the rope to the oil tank, but if there are more of us we can play 'Calling Soldiers'. The girl who jumps in first, jumps 4 times and says "Calling soldiers number one". The second girl jumps in for one time saying "Calling soldiers number two". This girl jumps over the turning rope twice and says "Calling soldiers number three". The game carries on until someone cannot jump over the rope the right number of times. They become "out" and hold the rope and the game starts again. We play Army on the running track at school. We lie in the tracks and shoot girls. A game of catch. I you catch the ball you take one step forward; if you drop the ball, one step back.
